## JsonRpcProvider.marketParticipants() method

returns the Escrow and Locked balances of every participant in the Storage Market

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
marketParticipants(tipSetKey?: TipSetKey): Promise<{
        [k: string]: MarketBalance;
    }>;
```
